cells.data:
[ASTR101_LEC24_LineSpectraFormation.pptx](quiver-file-url/EF23CA49E0419598BE486EBD1B65B6C0.pptx)

Molecules produce emission and absorption spectra in 3 different ways

1. Electrons in atoms change energy levels (UV or visible)
1. The molecule changes how fast it’s vibrating (infrared)
1. The molecule changes how fast it’s rotating (radio)
